title: Resolve duplicate thiserror dependency versions
description:
The codebase has duplicate versions of thiserror (v1.0.69 and v2.0.18).

Details:
- shotgun directly depends on thiserror v1.0.69
- bollard (docker client) transitively pulls in thiserror v2.0.18
- This creates unnecessary binary bloat

Resolution options:
1. Update bollard dependency to a version that uses thiserror v1.x (if available)
2. Update shotgun to use thiserror v2.x to match bollard
3. Document as acceptable if no easy resolution exists

Impact: Low priority - builds work fine, but increases binary size slightly.

title: Rename executor module to orchestrator
description:
Comprehensively rename the 'executor' module to 'orchestrator' since Orchestrator is its key component.

Files to rename:
- src/executor.rs → src/orchestrator.rs
- src/executor/ directory → src/orchestrator/ directory
- src/executor/runner.rs → src/orchestrator/runner.rs
- src/executor/retry.rs → src/orchestrator/retry.rs
- src/executor/scheduler.rs → src/orchestrator/scheduler.rs

References to update:
- lib.rs: pub mod executor → pub mod orchestrator, re-exports
- main.rs: use shotgun::executor::Orchestrator
- report.rs: use crate::executor::RunResult
- report/junit.rs: use crate::executor::RunResult
- Documentation strings in executor.rs, lib.rs, runner.rs, retry.rs, scheduler.rs

Doc comments referencing shotgun::executor::* must be updated to shotgun::orchestrator::*
